message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. We can always adjust in the next round.
Your turn, Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than that.  Let's meet in the middle at 57/43.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is more than fair. Take it or leave it -  the clock is ticking!
